reviewText: My Mom's vcr had eaten her original copy. So l reordered her a new one. She loves Carlton Pearson!! Homeboy from San Diego!
Wonderful, fulfilling  and Joyous! A Must for the home and the heart.....Music that will  carry us, (individuals) through  from day to day. Songs of hope, really a must buy..YOU will not regret it!
Loking everywhere.. found it on Amazion.. LOVE it.. especially "the mother Sherman story" ...
This d vd is marvelous. The songs are great and the audience is really involved. I would like to know if there are other Azusa dvd's.

This waws jsut as great as listening to the CD, but even better because you get to visualize and see everyone in their element. It felt like good old fashioned church. The kind that some people seem to have forgotten.
